thread.title: adidas’s Silky “Bronze” Ultra Boost 3.0 Might Be Its Finest Yet
thread.title_full: adidas’s Silky “Bronze” Ultra Boost 3.0 Might Be Its Finest Yet

author: Daniel Pearson
title: adidas’s Silky “Bronze” Ultra Boost 3.0 Might Be Its Finest Yet
text:
Brand : adidas 
Model : Ultra Boost 3.0 
Key Features : This is adidas’s first-ever Bronze-tinted Ultra Boost. It comes with an all-black 3.0 upper, leather cages and branding at the tongue and heel. 
Release Date : May 31 
Price : Approximately $190 
Availability : adidas and select retailers. 
Editor’s Notes : We’ve seen a ton of different colorways across the adidas Ultra Boost silhouette over the last couple of years, but this one might just be its finest yet. The black upper is versatile enough to be worn all year round, and that bronze Boost tooling adds a definite air of luxury. A must-cop for Ultra Boost-heads. 
In other sneaker news, here the 10 best air sneakers we saw at The Department of Nike Archives.
